title: Lombardi's Week 1 Reactions | GM Street (Ep. 298)
description:
The Ringer's Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier highlight five standout performances from the opening weekend, discuss and debunk Week 1 narratives, and give out awards for who stole the show to start the season.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
